trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were 4 other sightings in Philadelphia on or around July 4th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI decided to go outside in front of my house after hearing a lot of fireworks going on outside, I decided to go get my camera to take photos of them because I wanted to send them to my kids in Florida. after looking to the sky to see the fireworks I noticed the sky was bountiful because the sun was going down. I shot two or three photos and looked at them but i did not noticed nothing out of the ordinary. I kept shooting more. After about an hour and a half I decided to go inside and transfer them to my computer. And that's when I noticed these circles, the faded ones did not surprised me much but the clear blue one did.After that I made sure the lens from the camera was clean, thinking that maybe that could have been the problem but even after I wipe the lens i decided to shot more photos outside, by that time it was dark outside and there was no fireworks been shot. I shot more photos and the circle appeared again but this time it was real bright, and this last time I shot I pointed my camera towards a different direction to the sky. I would like someone to tell me what this could be. could this be a reflection of some sort or what? Thank you in advance
Summary: A blue sphere apeared in the photo on the sky even though I didn't see it with just by looking at the sky.
